response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth $15,000 to you. To ensure we both benefit from this transaction, I propose a special introductory price of $14,000 for you. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent opportunity to acquire a product that is truly worth more. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 14000}
